name: 100% Golf
description:
Putt with percentages in this chill golf game.

Use your 100 percentage points of power to get it to the hole!

+ 3 courses with 27 holes to beat!
+ Unlock the Endless Mode for infinite putting
+ Fast forward button to speed up shots
+ Night colour mode so you can scratch that golf itch in bed
+ Compete with your friends to get the best course % average!
+ Fresh spin on the Par system

The ads displayed in the game help me keep making games, but if you want them to go away, ads can be disabled for a small price. Thanks for your support!
